course_title: Writing and Inquiry in the Liberal Arts: How to Be an Anti-Racist
class_notes: Synchronous class attendance required.  One required synchronous class meeting per week.  Please visit the link to view detailed theme: https://inside.oxford.emory.edu/academics/writing-program/first-year-writing.html
course_description: Introduction to writing and inquiry in the liberal arts, with attention to variations across disciplines and rhetorical situations. Intensive practice in academic reading, writing, and research. Guidance in writing strategies and processes for diverse purposes and genres. First-year writing requirement.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 6147, Section #: 12, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: S. McQuaide, Status: Closed
